text: Higeno Deviti'a marerino Ba'al-Perazimi kumate Filistia vahera hara eme huzamanteno, hara huzamagatere'ne. Ana'ma huteno Deviti'a anage hu'ne, Tima hageno mika'zama eri harafi'ma huno eviankna huno Ra Anumzamo'a ha' vahe'ni'a zamahe panani hu'ne. Ana hu'negu ana kumamofo agi'a Ba'al Perazimie hu'za nehaze.
